name: 林家薇
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生奠定英語基礎，以促進英語聽、說、讀、寫能力之提升，並教導學生自學、自修的方法，提高英語學習的興趣。
schedule:
Week 1 Orientation
Week 2 Life Around the World
Week 3 Phone Messages
Week 4 Welcome Address
Week 5 Experiencing Nature
Week 6 A Scaring Hike
Week 7 Weather Forecast
Week 8 Living to Eat or Eating to Live
Week 9 Mid-Term Exam
Week 10 Advice: Healthy Eating
Week 11 Regional Foods
Week 12 In the Community
Week 13 Cities and Towns
Week 14 Following or Giving Directions
Week 15 Home
Week 16 Finding the Right Apartment
Week 17 Touring an Apartment
Week 18 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
期中考 30%
期末考 30%
平時成績 40% (出席率，小考，口說練習，討論，寫作練習等等)
materials:
Requried:
Strategic READING 2: Building Effective Reading Skills (by J. Richard & S. Eckstut-Didier )
Interactions 1: Listening & Speaking (by J. Tanka & P. Most)
